name: simple-tracker
description: A simple javascript client side tracker to log events and errors

scripts.test: sed 's/(window, document)$//' src/simple-tracker.js | sed '1s/^/module.exports = /' > test/simple-tracker.js; ENV=tests ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -R spec ./test/unit/**/*.js ./test/unit/**/**/*.js

author: Nikolay Feldman
